parameters.description: The code to run. Can be a file ID from within Shuffle.
parameters.name: code
parameters.value:
import json
import sys

def linux_iocs(alert):
    # Lista para almacenar los IoCs extra√≠dos
    ioc_lists = []

    # Campos a buscar y su informaci√≥n de IoC
    ioc_mappings = {
        "srcip": {"ioc_type_id": "79", "ioc_tags": "ip-src"},
        "dstuser": {"ioc_type_id": "133", "ioc_tags": "target-user"},
        "id": {"ioc_type_id": "96", "ioc_tags": "data-id"},
        "extra_data": {"ioc_type_id": "96", "ioc_tags": "data-extra"},
        "operational_data":{"ioc_type_id": "96", "ioc_tags": "zabbix-data"},
        "url": {"ioc_type_id": "96", "ioc_tags": "data-url"},
        "ip": {"ioc_type_id": "79", "ioc_tags": "ip-agent"},
        "program_name": {"ioc_type_id": "96", "ioc_tags": "process-name"},
        "package": {"ioc_type_id": "96", "ioc_tags": "package-name"},
        "hostname": {"ioc_type_id": "79", "ioc_tags": "domain"},
        "location": {"ioc_type_id": "97", "ioc_tags": "path"},
    }

    # Extraer el contenido de all_fields donde est√°n los datos principales
    eventdata = alert.get("all_fields", {})

    # Conjunto para rastrear qu√© claves ya fueron encontradas
    found_keys = set()

    # üîπ PRIMERO: Buscar los campos en el nivel superior de all_fields (sin entrar en subniveles)
    for key in ioc_mappings.keys():
        if key in eventdata and eventdata[key]:  # Si el campo existe y tiene valor
            ioc_lists.append({
                "ioc_value": eventdata[key],
                "ioc_description": "Extracted from Wazuh alert (type: Linux syslog)",
                "ioc_tlp_id": 2,
                "ioc_type_id": ioc_mappings[key]["ioc_type_id"],
                "ioc_tags": ioc_mappings[key]["ioc_tags"]
            })
            found_keys.add(key)  # Marcar como encontrado

    # üîπ SEGUNDO: B√∫squeda recursiva en niveles m√°s profundos (si el campo a√∫n no fue encontrado)
    def search_iocs(data):
        if isinstance(data, dict):
            for key, value in data.items():
                if key in ioc_mappings and key not in found_keys and value:
                    ioc_lists.append({
                        "ioc_value": value,
                        "ioc_description": "Extracted from Wazuh alert (type: Linux syslog)",
                        "ioc_tlp_id": 2,
                        "ioc_type_id": ioc_mappings[key]["ioc_type_id"],
                        "ioc_tags": ioc_mappings[key]["ioc_tags"]
                    })
                    found_keys.add(key)  # Marcar como encontrado
                
                # Seguir buscando en estructuras anidadas solo si el campo no fue encontrado
                if key not in found_keys:
                    search_iocs(value)

        elif isinstance(data, list):
            for item in data:
                search_iocs(item)

    # Ejecutar la b√∫squeda en subniveles solo si faltan IoCs
    search_iocs(eventdata)

    return ioc_lists

   
def windows_iocs(alert):
    # Lista para almacenar los IoCs extra√≠dos
    ioc_lists = []

    # Campos a buscar y su informaci√≥n de IoC
    ioc_mappings = {
        "path": {"ioc_type_id": "97", "ioc_tags": "path"},
        "threat Name": {"ioc_type_id": "88", "ioc_tags": "malware"},
        "detection User": {"ioc_type_id": "133", "ioc_tags": "user"},
        "computer":  {"ioc_type_id": "133", "ioc_tags": "user"},
        "process Name": {"ioc_type_id": "96", "ioc_tags": "process"},
        "scriptBlockText": {"ioc_type_id": "96", "ioc_tags": "process"},
        "product Name": {"ioc_type_id": "96", "ioc_tags": "process"},
        "detection ID": {"ioc_type_id": "79", "ioc_tags": "detection-id"},
        "subjectUserName": {"ioc_type_id": "133", "ioc_tags": "subject-user"},
        "subjectDomainName": {"ioc_type_id": "79", "ioc_tags": "domain"},
        "workstationName": {"ioc_type_id": "133", "ioc_tags": "attack-user"},
        "targetUserName": {"ioc_type_id": "133", "ioc_tags": "target-user"},
        "computer": {"ioc_type_id": "133", "ioc_tags": "hostname"},
        "ipAddress": {"ioc_type_id": "79", "ioc_tags": "ip-src"},
        "subjectLogonId": {"ioc_type_id": "96", "ioc_tags": "logon-id"},
        "processName": {"ioc_type_id": "96", "ioc_tags": "process-name"},
        "processId": {"ioc_type_id": "96", "ioc_tags": "process-id"},
        "scriptBlockId": {"ioc_type_id": "96", "ioc_tags": "process-id"},
        "status": {"ioc_type_id": "96", "ioc_tags": "status"},
        "subStatus": {"ioc_type_id": "96", "ioc_tags": "sub-status"},
        "binary": {"ioc_type_id": "96", "ioc_tags": "binary"},
        "authenticationPackageName": {"ioc_type_id": "96", "ioc_tags": "authentication-package"},
        #"data": {"ioc_type_id": "96", "ioc_tags": "product"}  # Solo se a√±adir√° si est√° en 'data' y no es una lista
    }

      # Extraer el contenido de all_fields donde est√°n los datos principales
    all_fields = alert.get("all_fields", {})

    # Conjunto para rastrear qu√© claves ya fueron encontradas
    found_keys = set()
    # üîπ Funci√≥n de b√∫squeda recursiva en toda la estructura de all_fields
    def search_iocs(data):
        if isinstance(data, dict):
            for key, value in data.items():
                # Si el campo est√° en ioc_mappings y no ha sido encontrado antes, lo agregamos
                if key in ioc_mappings and key not in found_keys and value:
                    ioc_lists.append({
                        "ioc_value": value,
                        "ioc_description": "Extracted from Wazuh alert (type: Windows event)",
                        "ioc_tlp_id": 2,
                        "ioc_type_id": ioc_mappings[key]["ioc_type_id"],
                        "ioc_tags": ioc_mappings[key]["ioc_tags"]
                    })
                    found_keys.add(key)  # Marcar como encontrado

                # Seguir explorando estructuras anidadas
                search_iocs(value)

        elif isinstance(data, list):
            for item in data:
                search_iocs(item)


    # Ejecutar la b√∫squeda recursiva en toda la estructura de all_fields
    search_iocs(all_fields)

    # A√±adir ip agente a IoCs
    agent_info = all_fields.get("agent", {})
    if agent_info:
        ioc_lists.append({
            "ioc_value": agent_info.get("ip"),
            "ioc_description": "Extracted from Wazuh alert (type: Windows event)",
            "ioc_tlp_id": 2,
            "ioc_type_id": "79",
            "ioc_tags": "ip-agent"
        })

    return ioc_lists


def main():
    alert = json.loads(r'''$repeat''')
    ioc_lists = []
    groups = alert.get("all_fields", {}).get("rule", {}).get("groups",{})
    if not "syslog" in groups:
      ioc_lists = windows_iocs(alert)
    else:
      ioc_lists = linux_iocs(alert)

    print(json.dumps({"alert_iocs": ioc_lists}, ensure_ascii=False))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

parameters.name: code
parameters.value:
import json
import requests

# Datos de ejemplo (reemplaza con datos reales seg√∫n sea necesario)
api_key = "$iris_api_key"
endpoint_url = "$iris_url"+"/case/ioc/add"
case_id = "$create_case.body.data.case_id"  # ID del caso al que se asociar√°n los IoCs
ioc_data = json.loads(r'''$extract_ioc.message.alert_iocs''')

# Encabezados de la solicitud
headers = {
    "Authorization": f"Bearer {api_key}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json"
}

# Iterar sobre cada IoC y realizar la solicitud POST
for ioc in ioc_data:
    # Crear la URL con el par√°metro `cid`
    url = f"{endpoint_url}?cid={case_id}"
    
    # Crear el cuerpo de la solicitud
    payload = {
        "ioc_type_id": ioc["ioc_type_id"],
        "ioc_tlp_id": ioc["ioc_tlp_id"],
        "ioc_value": ioc["ioc_value"],
        "ioc_description": ioc["ioc_description"],
        "ioc_tags": ioc["ioc_tags"],
    }

    try:
        # Realizar la solicitud POST
        response = requests.post(url, json=payload, headers=headers, verify=False)
        
        # Comprobar si la solicitud fue exitosa
        if response.status_code == 200:
            print(f"Response: {response.status_code}, Body: {response.text}")
        else:
            print(f"Error al a√±adir IoC {ioc['ioc_value']}: {response.status_code}, {response.text}")
    except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e:
        print(f"Error en la solicitud POST para IoC {ioc['ioc_value']}: {e}")

import json
import requests

# Configuraci√≥n
api_key = "$iris_api_key"
base_url = "$iris_url"
agent = "$repeat.all_fields.agent.name"
customer_name = agent.split("-")[0]
#En caso de que sea alerta de la puerta, asignar a AIR
if customer_name == "wazuh":
  #customer_name="AIR"
  customer_name="Valorh2"

# Obtener el customer_id a partir del nombre
customers_url = f"{base_url}/manage/customers/list"
response = requests.get(customers_url, headers={"Authorization": f"Bearer {api_key}"}, verify=False)

if response.status_code == 200:
    customers = response.json().get("data", [])
    customer_id = next((c["customer_id"] for c in customers if c["customer_name"].lower() == customer_name.lower()), None)
else:
    print("‚ùå Error al obtener la lista de customers.")
    exit()

if not customer_id:
    print(f"Customer '{customer_name}' no encontrado.")
    exit()
    
# Crear el objeto con nombre e ID del customer
customer_info = {
    "customer_name": customer_name,
    "customer_id": customer_id
}

# Imprimir el objeto como JSON (opcional)
print(json.dumps(customer_info, indent=4))

parameters.value:
import json
import requests

# Configuraci√≥n
api_key = "$iris_api_key" #Workflow variable
base_url = "$iris_url" #Workflow variable
customer_name = "$customer.message.customer_name"
customer_id = "$customer.message.customer_id"

# Obtener lista de analistas
data = json.loads(r'''$list_groups.body''')
analyst_group = next((group for group in data["data"] if group["group_name"] == "Analysts"), None)
if not analyst_group:
    print("El grupo 'Analysts' no se encontr√≥.")
    exit()

# Filtrar analistas por customer_id
analysts = []
for user in analyst_group["group_members"]:
    user_id = user["id"]
    # Consultar a qu√© customer pertenece el usuario
    user_url = f"{base_url}/manage/users/{user_id}"
    response = requests.get(user_url, headers={"Authorization": f"Bearer {api_key}"}, verify=False)
    
    if response.status_code == 200:
        user_data = response.json().get("data", {})
        user_customers = user_data.get("user_customers", [])
        # Verificar si el usuario pertenece al customer deseado
        belongs_to_customer = any(c["customer_id"] == int(customer_id) for c in user_customers)
        if belongs_to_customer:
            analysts.append({
                "id": user_id,
                "name": user.get("name"),
            })

# Mostrar resultado
if analysts:
    print(json.dumps(analysts, indent=4))

else:
    print(f"No hay analistas en el customer '{customer_name}'.")

parameters.value:
import json loadeddata = json.loads(r'''$repeat''') # Obtener los campos necesarios del JSON rule = loadeddata.get("all_fields", {}).get("rule", {}) agent = loadeddata.get("all_fields", {}).get("agent", {}) # Extraer informaci√≥n del campo "rule" (MITRE, ID, etc.) mitre = rule.get("mitre", {}) mitre_ids = ', '.join(mitre.get("id", ["N/A"])) mitre_tactics = ', '.join(mitre.get("tactic", ["N/A"])) mitre_techniques = ', '.join(mitre.get("technique", ["N/A"])) rule_groups = ', '.join(rule.get("groups", ["N/A"])) # Obtener grupos como lista # Comprobar que sistema usa el host if "windows" in rule_groups: # Extraer el full_log original sin modificar full_log_raw = loadeddata.get("all_fields", {}).get("data", {}) else: full_log_raw = loadeddata.get("all_fields", {}).get("full_log", {}) # Funci√≥n para limpiar el texto y hacerlo m√°s legible en IRIS def clean_text_for_iris(text): """ Limpia el texto eliminando o reemplazando caracteres especiales para que se muestre correctamente en IRIS y evitar fallos en Shuffle """ if not isinstance(text, str): text = str(text) # Reemplazar caracteres especiales por espacios o saltos de l√≠nea HTML cleaned_text = ( text.replace('\n', '
') # Saltos de l√≠nea a HTML .replace('\r', '') # Eliminar retornos de carro .replace('\t', ' ') # Tabulaciones a espacios .replace('\\n', '
') # Escapados a HTML .replace('\\r', '') # Eliminar escapados .replace('\\t', ' ') # Escapados a espacios .replace('\\"', '') # Eliminar comillas dobles escapadas completamente .replace('"', '') # Eliminar comillas dobles normales .replace("\\'", '') # Eliminar comillas simples escapadas .replace("'", '') # Eliminar comillas simples normales ) return cleaned_text # Aplicar limpieza al full_log full_log_cleaned = clean_text_for_iris(full_log_raw) alert_title = clean_text_for_iris(loadeddata.get("title", "N/A")) # Crear un string con los detalles, separados por
iocs = json.loads(r'''$analysis''') iocs = iocs.get("message", {}) # Si iocs es un diccionario o lista, convertirlo a texto legible if isinstance(iocs, (dict, list)): iocs_text = json.dumps(iocs, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) iocs_cleaned = clean_text_for_iris(iocs_text) else: iocs_cleaned = clean_text_for_iris(str(iocs)) alert_description = ( f"Rule ID: {rule.get('id', 'N/A')}
" f"Rule Level: {rule.get('level', 'N/A')}
" f"Rule Description: {clean_text_for_iris(rule.get('description', 'N/A'))}
" f"Agent ID: {agent.get('id', 'N/A')}
" f"Agent Name: {agent.get('name', 'N/A')}
" f"MITRE IDs: {mitre_ids}
" f"MITRE Tactics: {mitre_tactics}
" f"MITRE Techniques: {mitre_techniques}
" f"Location: {loadeddata.get('location', 'N/A')}
" f"Full_log:
{full_log_cleaned}
" f"------------------------
" f"Analysis IoCs:
{iocs_cleaned}
" ) # Asignar el resultado para que Shuffle lo recoja output = { "alert_description": clean_text_for_iris(alert_description), # Este es el resultado procesado como string "alert_title": alert_title, "alert_mitre_ids": mitre_ids, # Mantiene el array "alert_mitre_tactics": mitre_tactics, # Mantiene el array "alert_mitre_techniques": mitre_techniques, # Mantiene el array "alert_rule_groups": rule_groups, # Mantiene el array "alert_full_log": full_log_cleaned, # El full_log limpio "analysis_iocs": iocs, "success": True, "message": "Alert details processed successfully." } # Mostrar la salida para Shuffle print(json.dumps(output, ensure_ascii=False))

parameters.value:
import json
import requests
import random

data = json.loads(r'''$list_groups.body''')
api_key="$iris_api_key"
hook_url="$iris_url"+"/manage/cases/filter?case_owner_id="
# Encontrar el grupo 'Analysts' en la lista de grupos
#analyst_group = next((group for group in data["data"] if group["group_name"] == "Analysts"), None)
analyst_group = json.loads(r'''$analysts_org.message''')
id_owner=None
number_cases=None
candidates = []
if analyst_group:
    #for user in analyst_group["group_members"]:
    for user in analyst_group:
        id_owner=user["id"]
        #Lanzar peticion get a hookurl+id_owner
        response = requests.get(hook_url+str(id_owner), headers={"Authorization": "Bearer "+api_key,"content-type": "application/json"},verify=False)
        if response.status_code == 200:
            output = response.json()
            #print("User "+user["name"]+": "+str(output["data"]["total"]))
            if number_cases==None or number_cases == 0:
              number_cases = output["data"]["total"]
              candidates.append(user)
              
            elif output["data"]["total"]<number_cases:
                number_cases=output["data"]["total"]
                candidates=[]
                candidates.append(user)
                
            elif output["data"]["total"]==number_cases:
                candidates.append(user)
            
        else:
            print("Error al obtener los casos asignados al usuario "+user["name"])
    #Elegir a alguien aleatorio de los candidatos
    if len(candidates)>0:
        chosen_one=random.choice(candidates)
        print(json.dumps(chosen_one, indent=4))
    else:
        print("No se ha encontrado ningun usuario con casos asignados")

else:
    print("El grupo 'Analysts' no se encontr√≥.")

comments.label: Este paso ser√≠a con las credenciales del mail a utilizar para notificar a los analistas, utilizando la propia integraci√≥n de shuffle.
Aqu√≠ se analizar√≠a el resultado del DRL y los IOCs. Si en el DRL se confirma que el caso puede ser sospechoso se seguir√≠a con el flujo. Si no, se parar√≠a la generaci√≥n de la alerta.
